ygData.subject: Recurrency Pseudocode
ygData.msgSnippet: I have it working now and thought I would post the quasi-pseudocode for how this works in my implementation: For Each neuron if not input neuron, init

I have it working now and thought I would post the quasi-pseudocode 
for how this works in my implementation:


For Each neuron
    if not input neuron, init TotalInput=0
    Init Fired=False
Next

For each TimeStep
    For each Neuron
        init fired switch to false
        For each Link
            IF link is active &&
               links output neuron=currentNeuron &&
               links input neurons totalValue > 0 THEN
                IF link has fired=FALSE THEN
                   IF links input neuron > threshold THEN
                      FIRE Neuron by adding its weight to the links 
                        output neuron
                      Store the fired neurons ID
                    END
                END
             END
         NEXT Link
     NEXT Neuron
     FOR EACH Link that fired, set its fired value to TRUE
NEXT Timestep
